Title: Requires certain healthcare facilities to notify residents of changes involving such patient or resident in the facility
Summary: Requires certain healthcare facilities to notify residents of changes involving such patient or resident in the facility, including but not limited to any accident or incident requiring intervention by a medical professional.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring certain healthcare facilities to notify residents of changes involving such patient or resident in the facility
